## <img src="https://camo.githubusercontent.com/e6733dc875a6a93407349aeb14b502a16750420d342e92c7d3f1f287fa4a828e/68747470733a2f2f692e70696e696d672e636f6d2f6f726967696e616c732f33662f37652f34652f33663765346566663763393665396665346238623462316666336637626462352e676966" data-canonical-src="https://i.pinimg.com/originals/3f/7e/4e/3f7e4eff7c96e9fe4b8b4b1ff3f7bdb5.gif" style="max-width: 100%; display: inline-block; margin-right:2px;" data-target="animated-image.originalImage" width="54.98px"> About Me

Hi there! I'm **Myungjoo Jang**, a frontend developer. 😎

I have a deep passion for clean UI and well-structured code,  
and I believe that **frontend development also deserves solid architecture**.

🙋‍♂️ Curious to know more?  
Visit my homepage: [myungjoo.dev](https://myungjoo.dev)
